name: Legends of Geshcast: Kappa's Crypt
description:
October 30th - Gerry and Kris went in search of the Mackenzie Poltergeist but they did not return

October 31st - Gav and Phill head to the Black Mausoleum to rescue the others and reunite the quadratic brotherhood

== CONTROLS ==

Arrow keys to move and jump

Z to throw bombs

S to use the mirror shield

A to charge up the stomp boots, release A to use them
